Equipment Actions.Action 1: Longsword, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 9 Slashing plus 18 Necrotic

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Death Knight makes 3 Longsword attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Hellfire Orb, The Death Knight hurls a magical ball of fire that explodes, each creature caught in its radius takes an average of 35 Fire and 35 Necrotic damage
Other Actions.Action 3: Parry, The Death Knight adds 6 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it, Reaction

Abilities.Ability 1: Magic Resistance, The Death Knight has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 2: Marshal Undead, The Death Knight and its undead allies have advantage on saving throws against featuers tha tturn undead
Abilities.Ability 3: Spellcasting, The Death Knight is a fallen paladin, a 19th level spellcaster with a number of Paladin spells prepared for battle
